people_also_ask.heading: The crispness of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2 is really great on Xbox and PlayStation, but the Switch version is way better than I expected. It looks really good, despite a loss in visual fidelity. ... The game might feature better experiences on other consoles, but the Switch version is more than just a port.28-Jun-2021
people_also_ask.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2 Switch Review - Is It Worth It?

people_also_ask.heading: Spider-Man was one of the most popular skaters in the original Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2. As an unlockable character, the web-slinging superhero came with several unique tricks. However, Spider-Man is completely missing from the new Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2, a remake of the first two games in the series.14-Sep-2020
people_also_ask.title: Why Spider-Man Isn't In Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2

people_also_ask.heading: Please. Fortunately, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 doesn't require the most demanding computer components. To play the game, your gaming PC needs at least an AMD FX 6300 or Intel Core i3-4340 CPU, AMD HD 7950 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 GPU, 8GB of RAM, 19.4GB of storage, and the Windows 10 operating system.23-Sep-2020
people_also_ask.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 (for PC) Review | PCMag

people_also_ask.heading: This game is absolutely terrible. The controls are clunky, especially with the 'slam down' function and the gameplay is executed horribly. You're dumped into a freeskate mode in which you skate with other players, but there's literally no reason for them to be there at all.01-Oct-2015

knowledge_panel.description: tony hawk's pro skater 2 is a skateboarding video game developed by neversoft and published by activision. it is the second installment in the tony hawk's series of sports games and was released for the playstation in 2000, with subsequent ports to microsoft windows, game boy color, and dreamcast the same year. wikipedia
